sentence: “You have a chance today to put fear into the heart of Dr. Oz, and Dave McCormick, and that whole cast of characters because they don’t want to run against Conor Lamb,” he said, referring to the top two candidates seeking the Republican Senate nomination.
author: Daniel Marans
title: Pennsylvania Democrats Decline To Endorse In Senate Primary

sentence: Ron DeSantis’ PAC and into Honor Pennsylvania, a super PAC backing fellow hedge funder Dave McCormick — and opposing celebrity physician Mehmet Oz — in Pennsylvania’s GOP Senate primary, making Griffin the biggest individual donor to those two groups so far.
title: The Republican megadonor funding the party’s 2022 hopes

sentence: JOHN FETTERMAN and Rep. CONOR LAMB run ads arguing why they can win in one of the nation’s top battleground states, GOP candidates there have dropped a record-shattering $35 million on TV — the vast majority coming from MEHMET OZ and DAVE MCCORMICK, the leading Republicans, whose camps are framing the other as a ‘liberal RINO’ and ‘Wall Street insider,’ respectively.” “‘They’re doing what I want them to do, which is kick the crap out of each other,’ said J.B. POERSCH, president of the Senate Majority PAC, Senate Democrats’ flagship super PAC.” — ICYMI (for all you watching this crazy Missouri primary …): “Schmitt raises $1.6M at Mar-a-Lago event, lands visit from Trump,” by Fox News’ Brooke Singman CHENEY’S GAMBIT — In 2007, the leftist crowd in Wyoming's liberal bastion of Jackson Hole dragged an effigy of DICK CHENEY through downtown in protest of the Iraq War.

sentence: There, disgraced TV physician Dr. Mehmet Oz is gunning hard to close a 9-point gap between himself and former George W. Bush administration official Dave McCormick.
title: Pennsylvania is ground zero for 2022’s ugliest Senate races

sentence: During the Pennsylvania Republican Senate primary debate forum, frontrunner Dave McCormick, saying that everyone should be held accountable for their past statements, confronted the celebrity doctor about his anti-fracking history over the years on his shows and in columns he has written.

title: Mehmet Oz Has Meltdown During Live Debate When Confronted With Record, Called ‘Liberal’

sentence: Pennsylvania Republican Senate candidate Dave McCormick opposes increasing the federal minimum wage and wants to keep it at its current level of $7.25 an hour, set in 2009, when it was raised from $6.55.

title: Super-Rich GOP Senate Candidate Says Keep Minimum Wage At $7.25

sentence: And Petrizzo notes that Trump, by endorsing Oz, has “ignited fury and ridicule among some of the loudest voices in Trumpworld.” “At issue among Trump’s most fervent supporters is the belief that Oz, a Turkish-American TV physician who has hobnobbed with Hollywood’s elite and has flip-flopped on the issue of abortion, isn’t a trustworthy’ America First’ Republican candidate, compared to fellow candidate Dave McCormick, who has ex-Trump Administration official Hope Hicks by his side,” Petrizzo explains.
author: Alex Henderson
title: Trump Endorsement Of Dr Oz Enrages ‘MAGA’ Followers
